context: I enjoyed the book about Steve Jobs. What can you tell me about it?
That book was written by Walter Isaacson in 2011.
I'm not familiar with him, but I enjoy non-fiction. What else has he written?
resp: He wrote Einstein. His Life and Universe as well as Benjamin Franklin: An American Life.
